block.p: SCHINDLER-Ruth. On June 24. Cherished wife of the late Sidney. Beloved mother of Susan and Naomi Stolar. Beloved mother-in-law of Stan Stolar. Devoted friend, confidante and activist. Services 12 noon, Schwartz Bros.-Jeffer Memorial Chapel (76th Road and Queens Blvd.), Forest Hills.
SCHINDLER-Ruth. We deeply mourn the passing of our dear friend and member. Heartfelt condolences to daughters Susan and Naomi (Stan). Three Arrows Co-Op Society Alice Appenzeller, President
